Row.Text: Why?! Why did you do this to us?! All we wanted to do was make and eat good cheese. We didn't wanna hurt anybody! You're...you're an evil monster!

You horrible person! I'm never gonna forgive you for destroying our pastures! I hope you never get to eat any cheese or drink any milk again, so you'll get oscar--ossifer--oss--your bones will get holes in them!
Ah, hey there! It's another world leader! My name is Nagisa! Don't worry, I don't bite![NEWLINE]...not anymore, anyway! Hehe!
Oh, cool! I found another nation! Your people look nice and friendly! Here, let's have a gourd of my finest Caciocavallo Podolico to celebrate!
Great to see you again! Gorau Glas!
Heeeeyy! You hungry? There's plenty of this Passendale Bel Age to go around!
I could smell your nasty presence coming, even with this Limburger in the room. What do you want?

I don't like you, and I'm gonna make sure the world knows it! You smell worse than a wheel of Stinking Bishop![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

I don't like you, and I'm gonna make sure the world knows it! You smell worse than a wheel of Stinking Bishop![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
